name: CL_RMT_CLM_INFO
description: This table contains the invoice level information to which the payment in the remittance record is posted.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: This is the ID for the remittance image record.

columns.name: INV_NO
columns.description: The invoice number for the remittance image.

columns.name: CLM_STAT_CD_C_NAME
columns.description: This is the code identifying the status of an entire claim.
entries: Processed as Primary, Forwarded to additional Payer(s)
Processed as Secondary, Forwarded to additional Payer(s)
Processed as Tertiary, Forwarded to additional Payer(s)
Not Our Claim, Forwarded to additional Payer(s)

columns.name: CLAIM_CHRG_AMT
columns.description: This is the amount for submitted charges on this claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_PAID_AMT
columns.description: This is the amount paid on the claim.

columns.name: PAT_RESP_AMT
columns.description: This is the patient responsibility amount for the claim.

columns.name: CLM_FILING_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: This is a code identifying the type of claim.

columns.name: ICN_NO
columns.description: This is the payer's internal control number for the claim.

columns.name: FAC_CODE_VAL
columns.description: This is the facility code used when the submitted code has been modified through adjudication.

columns.name: CLAIM_FREQ_C_NAME
columns.description: This is the frequency code of the claim.
entries: Final Claim for a Home Health PPS Episode
Hospice/Demonstration (CMS Coord, Centers of Ex, Prov Part)/Rel Non-Med Care Inst
Hospice/Demonstration (CMS Coord, Centers of Ex, Prov Part)/Rel Non-Med Care Inst V/C
Intermediary Adjustment Claim (Other than QIO or Provider)
Claim Submitted for Reconsideration Outside of Timely Limits
Void/Cancel a Prior Abbreviated Encounter Submission
Replacement of Prior Abbreviated Encounter Submission

columns.name: DRG_CODE
columns.description: This is the Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) code indicating a patient's diagnosis group based on a patient's illnesses, diseases, and medical problems.

columns.name: DISCHRG_FRAC
columns.description: The discharge fraction expressed as a decimal.

columns.name: FILE_INV_NUM
columns.description: Contains the actual invoice number that came in the file.
